title.en: Shinrei Tantei Yakumo - Akai Hitomi wa Shitteiru

description.en:
Based on the novel by Kaminaga Manabu. Shinrei Tantei Yakumo (Psychic Detective Yakumo) tells a story about a college student, Saitou Yakumo, who was born with different eye colors. His red left eye gave him the special ability to see ghosts and spirits. He believes ghosts and spirits are bound to earth because of a certain 'cause' and simply by eliminating that 'cause', those spirits will rest in peace. Being asked for help by Ozawa Haruka, together they began the investigation.

Includes an unrelated side story called Pen x Pal in vol.1.

[u][b]Polish / Polski:[/b][/u]  [spoiler]Shinrei Tantei Yakumo (Paranormalny Detektyw Yakumo) opowiada historię studenta, Saitou Yakumo, posiadacza pary różnokolorowych oczu. Jego prawe, czerwone oko pozwala mu widzieć duchy i zjawy. Saitou wierzy, że tylko niedokończone sprawy trzymają duchy na ziemi. Poproszony o pomoc w śledztwie, zgadza się pomóc w odszukaniu sprawcy.[/spoiler]
